name: Carpal Tunnel Defense
description:
Click the foul orcs and demons to annihilate them. Click resources to mine them and build structures also with your mighty click powers. Upgrade your various clicking talents by building blacksmiths.

Defend your fort with your life and  destroy all the goblin huts. 

Controls:

  • WASD moves camera
  • B opens build menu around your cursor
  • Click for everything else!

Credits:

Made by DrunkenSeagull and Rumpelstompskin

Known bugs:
Tiles can get a big wonky at resolutions other than 1080p
